milestones.label: hold
milestones.description: The hand is holding the Rubik's cube stationary.

milestones.label: wind_up
milestones.description: The hand begins the upward motion to toss the cube.

milestones.label: release
milestones.description: The cube leaves the hand's grip and enters flight.

milestones.label: flight
milestones.description: The cube is at the apex of its trajectory in the air.

milestones.label: catch
milestones.description: The hand makes contact with the cube to catch it.

milestones.label: stabilize
milestones.description: The hand has a firm grip on the cube and movement ceases.
